name: branching dialogue system
tagline: flexible dialogue system built in ue5 for branching narratives and dynamic npc responses
overview: A comprehensive dialogue system designed for modern game development, focusing on flexibility and scalability.
Built with modular architecture, the system allows designers to create rich conversational experiences.
Key features include emotional state tracking, conversation history persistence, and integration with existing game systems.

video.caption: dialogue system in action - dynamic npc responses based on player choices

process.title: research & planning
process.text: analyzed existing dialogue systems in games like disco elysium, mass effect, and cyberpunk 2077.

process.title: prototyping
process.text: created multiple prototypes testing different approaches to dialogue flow, data storage, and designer workflow.

process.title: implementation
process.text: developed core system using ue5 c++ for performance-critical components and blueprints for designer-facing tools.

process.title: testing & iteration
process.text: conducted extensive testing with narrative designers and programmers.

technical.title: architecture
technical.text: modular system built with component-based design.

technical.title: performance
technical.text: optimized for real-time performance with conversation caching, lazy loading of dialogue data, and efficient memory management.

technical.title: integration
technical.text: designed to integrate seamlessly with existing game systems.

results.title: adoption
results.text: successfully integrated into 3 shipped titles and 2 ongoing projects.

results.title: feedback
results.text: positive reception from narrative designers who praised the intuitive interface and powerful features.

results.title: recognition
results.text: featured in gamedeveloper.com article on modern dialogue systems.
